location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Henry Moore, East India Company Agent at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter gives news of the order from Shiraz that Sheik Ice [Sheikh ‘Isa] is to be appointed DariaBejir ( daryabegi- admiral), commander of the Persian fleet and thus must hand over rule of Barreen [Bahrain] to his brother Sheik Churrmam [?]. Also mentioned is the proposal by Sheik Calipha [Sheikh Khalifa] of Grain that an alliance be formed between themselves and the sheikhs of Bushire against Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna].
